subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
Series
lead_paragraph: Thousands of miles from home at a training compound in Senegal, the 400-meter world champion Amantle Montsho of Botswana is pursuing her Olympic dream.
snippet: Thousands of miles from home at a training compound in Senegal, the 400-meter world champion Amantle Montsho of Botswana is pursuing her Olympic dream.
